_meta.topic: Interactive pygame goal-click demo (forest bicycle env)
commands: conda run -n ros2py310 python -m pip install -r requirements-optional.txt
notes: Left-click sets goal; planner runs in a background thread; MPC tracks the planned path.
Planner choices: hybrid_astar / rrt_star / grid_astar / cnn_ddqn (cnn_ddqn requires --rl-checkpoint).
If planning feels slow on forest_a, try forest_d or reduce planner timeouts/max nodes.
